TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MappingItemCollection extends System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ItemCollection

Docs.summary: Collection of objects designed for storing mapping information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Data.Mapping.MappingItemCollection> inherits from <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ItemCollection>, providing strongly-typed accessors for retrieving mapping metadata.
